roleset.name: needless use

roles.note: Arg2 in this frame differs from the verbal frame in that it is not the instrument, but what arg1 is wasted on.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on a combination of waste-v.01 and the consume-66 and pay-68 VN classes. Corresponds to Vncls consume-66-1, destroy-44, pay-68.

example.name: just arg1
example.text: Her husband said voting was a waste of time .

example.name: just arg0
example.text: Business leaders have long criticized the agency as a leading example of bureaucratic waste

example.name: all args
example.text: The lavish privileges they have vested upon themselves, their waste of time on ceremonial banalities...
